nodes.text: The ISS-944 Power Droid was a battle droid owned by the reconstituted Sith Empire and used aboard the Harrower-class dreadnought Emperor's Glory during the Cold War. In 3643 BBY it was destroyed by a boarding party from a Republic transport Esseles.
ISS-944 Power Droid appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic as a bonus boss in the Hard Mode version of "The Esseles" flashpoint.
